entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:57 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
